title: Best of The Herd: 04/30/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 04/30/2019
description:
Colin thinks the NBA should fine the Rockets for releasing a report that the refs ruined their chance at the Finals last year because it is just more manipulation.  Now that the NFL offseason has slowed down, Colin ranks his top ten NFL teams in the Herd Hierarchy.  Plus, NBA Champion and 15yr NBA Veteran Kendrick Perkins comes in studio to talk about playing with Westbrook, Harden and why his Celtics team would beat the Warriors.  Presented by Perky Jerky.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
